meanings.definition: Detailed plan or design, especially for a building.
meanings.sent1: The architect showed us the blueprints for the new house.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers followed the blueprints carefully.
meanings.sent3: The blueprints for the treehouse were so detailed, they even included a tiny swing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a set of blueprints, carefully mapping out every step.
meanings.sent5: The blueprints were as clear as a sunny day, guiding us through the project effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The artist's blueprints for the sculpture were truly unique.
meanings.sent2: The blueprints of the invention were carefully preserved in the museum.
meanings.sent3: He proudly displayed the blueprints of his first ever drawing, a stick figure.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed freely as she sketched out the blueprints of her dream world.
meanings.sent5: The blueprints of the new car design were revolutionary, setting a new standard in the industry.

meanings.definition: To make a detailed plan or design.
meanings.sent1: She blueprints every project meticulously before starting any work.
meanings.sent2: They blueprinted the entire renovation before picking up a single tool.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he could blueprint a sandwich if given enough time.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to blueprint ideas quickly made her the go-to person for planning.
meanings.sent5: The team blueprints their strategy before every important game, ensuring success.
